mapper.select: select event_id, event_subject, event_content from tbl_event
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_event values((select nvl(max(event_id)+1,1) from tbl_event), #{event_subject}, #{event_content}, #{event_content_img}, #{event_banner_img}, #{event_square_img}, #{event_list_img})
mapper.update: update tbl_event set event_subject = #{event_subject}, event_content = #{event_content}, event_content_img = #{event_content_img}, event_banner_img = #{event_banner_img}, event_square_img = #{event_square_img}, event_list_img = #{event_list_img} where event_id = #{event_id}
update tbl_event set event_id = event_id - 1 where event_id > #{event_id}
